In England, in the seven days to 07 August, there were 169,215 new confirmed cases (299.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 July, there were 160,673 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (8,542 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 August is 5,398,629 (9,546.6 cases per 100,000 population).
